title: I want to buy the google pixel 4a. Is there authorised/ official store in Kolkata(West Bengal)
content: I am awed by the specs of the pixel 4a and am more than eager to get hands on experience with the phone. Is there any authorised or official store of google in  Kolkata. How would be the service repair or replacement if any be managed, is there any authorised service centre in Kolkata.
